channel.title: Links on Alasdair Sykes

item.title: R community links
item.description: At one stage I might have said my coding skills were self-taught — but I would strongly revise that to “community-taught” (credit to @EriPDev and @beeonaposy for introducing me to that phrasing in the context of R). In no particular order, here are the blogs of some folks that have helped me along the way: https://www.thedeltanomics.com https://scottishsnow.wordpress.com https://www.r-bloggers.com https://www.rosannavanhespen.nl https://www.jumpingrivers.com/blog
